channel.title: Bash on Leif Madsen.
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on Leif Madsen.

item.title: Finding available Ansible tags in playbooks and roles
item.description: Today I went down a yak shaving path trying to figure out how to get all the available tags in a fairly complicated plethora of Ansible playbooks and roles. One of these such situations involves TripleO Quickstart, which is made up of several different playbooks and repositories of different roles.
